item.title: 'ssl_stapling' ignored, host not found in OCSP responder 'r3.o.lencr.org' in the cert 'fullchain.pem'
item.author: Kitty • Panics
item.description: 在查看服务器日志时发现 Nginx 中有一个 Warn。 1 2 [warn] 285#285: "ssl_stapling" ignored, host not found in OCSP responder "r3.o.lencr.org" in the certificate "/XXXX/YYYY/ZZZZ/fullchain.pem" 看到这个警告第一反应是不是 Let’s Encrypt 的服务挂了，毕竟它以前也出过几次问
